analysis.description:
RefundEscrow.beneficiaryWithdraw (/unique_chucks/27/0x9d713e0a2f6a1c9650083ebca27f4520cd2cde8e.sol#675-681) sends eth to arbitrary user
	Dangerous calls:
	- beneficiary.transfer(address(this).balance) (/unique_chucks/27/0x9d713e0a2f6a1c9650083ebca27f4520cd2cde8e.sol#677-681)

Reentrancy in TokenSale._processPurchase (/unique_chucks/27/0x9d713e0a2f6a1c9650083ebca27f4520cd2cde8e.sol):
	External calls:
	- require(bool,string)(totalTokensSold <= token.balanceOf(address(this)),totalTokensSold raised must not exceed balanceOf `this`) (/unique_chucks/27/0x9d713e0a2f6a1c9650083ebca27f4520cd2cde8e.sol)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- balances (/unique_chucks/27/0x9d713e0a2f6a1c9650083ebca27f4520cd2cde8e.sol)

elements.expression: require(bool,string)(totalTokensSold <= token.balanceOf(address(this)),totalTokensSold raised must not exceed balanceOf `this`)

analysis.description:
TimedCrowdsale.constructor (/unique_chucks/27/0x9d713e0a2f6a1c9650083ebca27f4520cd2cde8e.sol#431-440) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- require(bool)(_openingTime >= block.timestamp) (/unique_chucks/27/0x9d713e0a2f6a1c9650083ebca27f4520cd2cde8e.sol#435-437)

TimedCrowdsale.hasClosed (/unique_chucks/27/0x9d713e0a2f6a1c9650083ebca27f4520cd2cde8e.sol#448-458) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- block.timestamp > closingTime (/unique_chucks/27/0x9d713e0a2f6a1c9650083ebca27f4520cd2cde8e.sol#457-458)
